title: Bring back the old 3v3 twisted treeline MAP!! PETITION

embed.title: Petition unterschreiben
embed.description: Riot games: Bring back the old 3v3 twisted treeline MAP!!

body:
Bring back the old 3v3 map in league of legends. If you don´t want to delete the new one just bring it back separately. -If there is a problem to do it separately, just delete the old one. -If you aren´t sure if you should do that, just open a surver, open for everyone to vote if you should/shouldn´t.
Reason:
-The old map was awesome. -The old map had wards. -The old map was balanced. -The old map had a bigger and greater jungle. -The old map had a red buff. -The old map was a waaaay funnier to play. -The old map had no stupid Altairs. -The old map had a dragon(buff).
1000 more reasons :D
In the name of all signers. {{champion:59}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
